experience: You and Jon both know John Fanning, Evan Elbert, and 1 other

As founder of Pacer Partners, Jon oversees all aspects of the business.  Previously, Jon held the title of Vice Chairman at Newmark Grubb Knight Frank, being named Vice Chairman at the age of 34.  He has worked with some of the country’s largest institutions and user groups, including corporations, universities and other global institutions across a wide spectrum of deal structures.  Jon has successfully structured and executed over 25 million square feet of transactions with an aggregate value of over $6 billion in all major markets in the United States. Jon is considered one of the thought leaders in real estate, regularly giving perspectives to many new media outlets including the Wall Street Journal. He’s received numerous awards, including Power Leader, 30 under 30, 40 Under 40, and Broker of the Year.

summary: Pacer Partners is a boutique real estate investment and asset management company backed by the deep institutional background of their executives.  Having the benefit of understanding that investors and end users think about real estate very differently, Pacer is able to bring forth a unique investing and asset management approach which marries the rigor of Pacer’s acquisition process with a deep understanding end users, who are the ultimate consumers of Pacer’s investments.
